hero.title: a sentence to welcome customer
hero.description: Some sentences to introduce about shop. Example: Browse through our diverse range of meticulously crafted garments, designed to bring out your individuality and cater to your sense of style.

characteristics.title: High-Quality Products
characteristics.description: Every item in our collection is crafted with meticulous attention to detail

characteristics.title: Sustainable Materials
characteristics.description: We're committed to reducing our environmental footprint by sourcing eco-friendly, organic

characteristics.title: Happy Customers
characteristics.description: With a 4.8/5 satisfaction rating from over 10,000 reviews.

characteristics.title: Fast & Free Shipping
characteristics.description: Enjoy complimentary standard shipping on all domestic orders over $50

characteristics.title: Easy Returns
characteristics.description: Shop with confidence knowing our hassle-free 30-day return policy

characteristics.title: Secure Payments
characteristics.description: Your transactions are protected with bank-level encryption and multiple payment options

about.title: Title about
about.description: Some sentences to introduce about shop. Example: At our shop, we believe in the power of fashion to express individuality and enhance confidence. Our mission is to provide you with high-quality garments that not only look good but also feel good to wear. We are committed to sustainability, using eco-friendly materials and ethical production practices to create a positive impact on the environment.

footer.title: Title footer
footer.description: Some sentences to introduce about shop. Example: We are dedicated to providing you with the best shopping experience possible. If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Our customer service team is here to help you with any inquiries or concerns.
footer.copyright: Copyright Â© 2023 Shop Name. All rights reserved.

register.description: Some sentences to introduce about shop. Example: Join our community of fashion enthusiasts and be the first to know about our latest collections, exclusive offers, and special events. Sign up for our newsletter and stay connected with us on social media.

benefit.value: Updates on fashion trends and tips

policy.title: 1. Information Collection
policy.content: We collect only necessary information to provide our services, including personal details you provide during registration and usage data to improve your experience.

policy.title: 2. Data Protection
policy.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access or disclosure.

policy.title: 3. Your Rights
policy.content: You have the right to access, correct, or request deletion of your personal data at any time.

policy.title: 4. Data Usage
policy.content: We use your information solely to provide and improve our services. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

policy.title: 5. Policy Updates
policy.content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify users of any significant changes to how we treat personal information.
